summary: Ian Noel, who was unlicensed, was found to have engaged in the unauthorized practice of medicine, including diagnosing conditions and presenting himself as a doctor. The Maryland State Board of Physicians issued a Cease and Desist Order on December 14, 2017, which was affirmed and made final on January 30, 2018. He is ordered to immediately cease and desist from providing any services that constitute the practice of medicine.
